title: KubeSkills Daily
description: Play with KubeSkills Daily and learn Kubernetes

items.title: Day 1 - Pod Restart Policies
items.description: Test how Kubernetes handles failures and restarts

items.title: Day 2 - StatefulSet Pod Ordering
items.description: Break ordered updates and compare OrderedReady vs Parallel management

items.title: Day 3 - OOMKilled vs Resource Limits
items.description: Trigger OOM events and compare Kubernetes QoS classes

items.title: Day 4 - Network Policy Lockouts
items.description: Enforce default deny, poke DNS/web holes, and recover access

items.title: Day 5 - Taints and Tolerations
items.description: Evict pods with NoExecute, compare tolerations, and explore NoSchedule

items.title: Day 6 - Liveness Probe Death Loops
items.description: Trigger, inspect, and fix misconfigured probes plus readiness/startup

items.title: Day 7 - Init Container Failures
items.description: Debug stuck init containers, add retries, and run sidecars

items.title: Day 8 - PVC Binding Failures
items.description: Storage that never arrives until you fix StorageClasses and modes

items.title: Day 9 - ConfigMap Updates - The Sync Gap
items.description: See why env vars freeze, volumes lag, and subPath never refreshes

items.title: Day 10 - Secret Rotation - Hot Swapping Credentials
items.description: Rotate secrets, see env/volume drift, and force rollouts to reload

items.title: Day 11 - Service DNS Propagation Delays
items.description: Watch DNS timing gaps, endpoint readiness, and headless vs ClusterIP behavior

items.title: Day 12 - HPA Thrashing - The Scale Storm
items.description: See aggressive HPAs thrash, tune behaviors, and test multi-metric scenarios

items.title: Day 13 - PodDisruptionBudgets - Blocking Maintenance
items.description: See how strict PDBs block drains, fix budgets, and explore conflict scenarios

items.title: Day 14 - ResourceQuota - Deployment Denied
items.description: See how quotas silently block pods, use LimitRanges, and explore scoped/count quotas
